tool_description: API for admin and user login and to schedule matches
name: cricbuzz
title: cricbuzz

api_list.name: Create match
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricbuzz8.p.rapidapi.com/api/matches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricbuzz8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
